dataset.select: SELECT id, sid, app_name, username, logged_in, error_string, group_list, address, julian(start_time) AS start_time FROM login WHERE (app_name IS NULL OR {$1}::text IS NULL OR {$1} = app_name) AND (username IS NULL OR {$2}::text IS NULL OR {$2} = username) ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 100
